value:
Seeing you and Alfonse together
reminds me of the time I've spent
with a friend of mine...

Back home, my Shepherds deal with
outlaws and monsters. It's strange
that here we battle against Heroes.

Keeping watch? Your dedication
reminds me of a certain tactician.
Don't push yourself too hard!

Care to spar? Or perhaps we could
just work on self-defense drills so
I don't break anything...

I was practicing my swing and
wound up smashing a pot. Forgive
me, $Nu.

Ah, are you the master of this
castle? I bring warm regards
from $Nf.
No one can stop me now!

My strength comes from
diligence.
Well, that was underwhelming.

I vow to use the power you grant
me wisely and well.

I'm Chrom, leader of the Shepherds
and Prince of the Halidom of Ylisse.
For my friends...for peace...I'll fight.

It seems like a lot of time has
passed since you and I first met.
At first I was bewildered, but...$k$pyour guidance has made me
stronger. May we ever remain
side by side.$k$pYou know, when I first met you,
you reminded me a lot of Robin.$k$pNot just your manner, but the way
you plan, help everyone, and work
to keep all of your allies alive.$k$pThere is no one I'd rather have
guiding my steps. This bond we've
built will last forever.
はっ！
せやあっ！
ぐあっ！
Damn!
Anything can change!
I will not fail!
Our bonds give me strength!
I'll finish this!
...Gods!
whew
Our bonds are far stronger than destiny.
That's an unusual weapon you have.
Is your Order of Heroes something akin to my Shepherds?
I hope things are well in Ylisse...
I miss the advice of my tactician.
Damn it... Broke another training dummy...
The bonds we forge are forever. I will always come to your aid, friend.
Yes?
All right.
Let's go.
